mapper.select:
SELECT distinct t1.station_code, t3.station_name FROM repair_task_station_rel t1 LEFT JOIN repair_task t2 ON t1.repair_task_code = t2.CODE LEFT JOIN cs_station t3 ON t3.station_code = t1.station_code
AND t2.id = #{taskId}
select station_code,position_code,line_code from repair_task_station_rel where repair_task_code = #{planCode}
select station_code,position_code,line_code from device where code = #{code}

select major_name as majorName, major_code as majorCode from cs_major
del_flag = 0
and major_code in
#{item}
select system_name as systemName, system_code as systemCode from cs_subsystem where del_flag = 0 and major_code = #{majorCode} and system_code = #{systemCode}

select name as deviceTypeName, code as deviceTypeCode from device_type
del_flag = 0
and code in
#{item}

SELECT t1.id as deviceId, t4.id as standardId, t1.duration as duration, t4.major_code as majorCode, t4.subsystem_code as systemCode, t4.device_type_code as deviceTypeCode, t1.device_code as equipmentCode, t1.start_time as startTime, t1.end_time as endTime, t1.station_code as stationCode, t1.line_code as lineCode, t1.position_code as positionCode, t1.specific_location as specificLocation, t1.staff_id as overhaulId, t1.code as resultCode, t1.fault_code as faultCode FROM repair_task_device_rel t1 LEFT JOIN repair_task_standard_rel t4 ON t4.id = t1.task_standard_rel_id WHERE t1.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM repair_task_enclosure WHERE repair_task_result_id =#{resultId}
select org_code from repair_task_org_rel where del_flag = 0 and repair_task_code = #{planCode}

select year,code,type,weeks,start_time,end_time,status from repair_task where status = 8 and is_confirm = 0 and date_format(submit_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_format(#{dateTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d') union select year,code,type,weeks,start_time,end_time,status from repair_task where status = 8 and is_confirm = 1 and is_receipt =0 and date_format(confirm_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_format(#{dateTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d') union select year,code,type,weeks,start_time,end_time,status from repair_task where status = 8 and is_confirm = 1 and is_receipt =1 and date_format(receipt_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_format(#{dateTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d')

select COUNT(DISTINCT rt.id) from repair_task rt left join repair_task_device_rel rtdr on rtdr.repair_task_id = rt.id left join repair_task_result rtr on rtr.task_device_rel_id = rtdr.repair_task_id where rtr.status =2 and rt.`status` = 8
and rt.code = #{code}

SELECT t3.status FROM repair_task t1 LEFT JOIN repair_task_device_rel t2 ON t2.repair_task_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN repair_task_result t3 ON t3.task_device_rel_id = t2.id where t1.del_flag =0 and t2.del_flag = 0 and t3.del_flag = 0 and t1.id = #{id}
select org_code from sys_user where id = #{id}
select realname from sys_user where id = #{id}

select id as userId, realname as userName from sys_user
1=1
and org_code in
#{item}
select a.id as orgId, a.org_code as orgCode, a.depart_name as orgName, a.org_category as orgCategory from sys_depart a where a.manager_id = #{id}
select a.id as orgId, a.org_code as orgCode, a.depart_name as orgName from sys_depart a where a.parent_id=#{id} and a.org_category in(3,4,5)
